      Turns off validation (for all calls made after)

      UpdateOperations<T> UpdateOperations.enableValidation()
      Turns on validation (for all calls made after); by default validation is on

      increments the numeric field by value (negatives are allowed)

      UpdateOperations<T> UpdateOperations.isolated()
      Deprecated. 
      this functionality is deprecated in mongodb 3.6 and has been removed from 4.0
